about_the_game:
"The big boy wearing a fox mask is not a human being. Once he is touched by a human being, he will disappear." From the first time I saw it back then, to now and then revisiting it from time to time, this story makes me cry every time.
Even such a perfect big boy cannot have perfect love, even if it is exchanged with his life.
Love is like this, life is like this, life is like this,
The story of "Summer Event Book" also begins from this, rewriting this extremely gentle but also extremely regrettable ending.
"A monster girl who falls in love with humans will turn into thousands of fireflies and disappear in an instant" is an irresistible "rule" of nature.
But love is irresistible, love is "out of control" in all circumstances. The two who can't really get close, but the bond is getting deeper and deeper, and it even becomes the only reason for each other to live in this world.
So, what choice should you make?
perhaps,
This seems to be a dilemma for which there is no cure.
You have been given a mission to start a new adventure in your life, and it's up to you to make a difference.
perhaps,
This is fate,
But at the same time, it is for "you" who is living alone and living well,
Offer a bouquet of love.

Game Features

  • Smart choice, happy ending.
  • Touch your inner emotions.
  • Collaborative performance of more than 20 characters.
  • Eighteen main characters are all in LIVE2D, with rich expressions and movements.
  • Full Chinese voice.
  • A collection of various interesting achievements.
  • The spiritual book list, song list, and film list of the production team.

Last words

Please allow me to express my sincerest thanks in the most humble way to everyone who has supported us.
detailed_description:
Fifty nine percent love


"Summer Event Book" is a visual novel game, and the complete game process is about 12 hours.

A well-known writer wrote such a description on the girdle of one of his best-selling books, "100% love novel", because of this book, and because of this girdle, I sprouted the idea of making "Summer Event Book" Original intention "100% love game". But unfortunately, despite all efforts, the goal of "100% love game" is still out of reach.

Fifty-nine, up to fifty-nine, failed!

So, please allow me to call "Summer Event Book" a "fifty-nine percent love game" with the cheek.


Only you can heal my heart

There is nothing more comforting than a beautiful girl's smile.

So, I put all my love and fantasies into a beautiful girl who laughs, even if the girl is not human. For this reason, "Summer Event Book" may be regarded as an "electronic love letter", a confession letter to the "perfect girl in my heart". It would be great if you could have a little bit of empathy when reading this "electronic love letter", if you could be warmed and comforted by such a "perfect girl who loves to laugh".

I wish you in front of the screen to find your "perfect girl" even if it's only in your "heart" or "dream".
